biotools.summary: TSEBRA is a combiner tool that selects transcripts from gene predictions based on the support by extrisic evidence in form of introns and start/stop codons. It was developed to combine BRAKER1 and BRAKER2 predicitons to increase their accuracies.

bioschemas.name: TSEBRA
bioschemas.summary: TSEBRA is a combiner tool that selects transcripts from gene predictions based on the support by extrisic evidence in form of introns and start/stop codons. It was developed to combine BRAKER1 and BRAKER2 predicitons to increase their accuracies.

galaxy.summary: This tool has been developed to combine BRAKER predictions.
galaxy.bio_tools_summary: TSEBRA is a combiner tool that selects transcripts from gene predictions based on the support by extrisic evidence in form of introns and start/stop codons. It was developed to combine BRAKER1 and BRAKER2 predicitons to increase their accuracies.
